---
desc: Converts govspeak warning callout (% syntax) into GOV.UK Frontend-compliant HTML
---

.
% this is a warning callout %
.
<div data-govspeak="warning-callout" aria-label="Warning" role="note">
<p class="govuk-body">this is a warning callout</p>
</div>
.

.
^ this is an information callout ^
% this is a warning callout %
.
<div data-govspeak="information-callout" aria-label="Information" role="note">
<p class="govuk-body">this is an information callout</p>
</div>
<div data-govspeak="warning-callout" aria-label="Warning" role="note">
<p class="govuk-body">this is a warning callout</p>
</div>
.

.
% this is a warning callout <div>test</div> %
.
<div data-govspeak="warning-callout" aria-label="Warning" role="note">
<p class="govuk-body">this is a warning callout &lt;div&gt;test&lt;/div&gt;</p>
</div>
.
